overview: A powerful and emotional new episode of ESPN E60 will look back 50 years to one of the darkest moments in sports history â€“ the Munich Massacre, when Palestinian terrorists murdered 11 Israeli sportsmen at the 1972 Summer Olympics. E60 will tell the story of one Israeli athlete, now 86, who survived, just as he had survived World War II and the Holocaust when he was a child.
title: The Survivor
